name: MARV 2EX
shortDescription: Extractive dust monitoring system for wet gases in explosive atmospheres (ATEX Zone 1/2).
longDescription: The MARV 2EX is designed for continuous measurement of dust concentration in industrial processes saturated with moisture, such as after wet scrubbers or in condensing environments.
It provides isokinetic sampling, accurate linear measurement, and constant dust level monitoring up to 0.1 mg/m³.
The system features PLC and HMI visualization for easy parameterization and complies with legally regulated measuring instruments (Certificate No. UA.TR.001 46-19).
features: Isokinetic sampling under variable flow conditions
Constant dust level measurement up to 0.1 mg/m³
Dust filter with automatic back-purge
Accurate linear measurement for all types of dust
PLC visualization software and HMI (local and web)

applications.description: Measures dust concentration before reuse of gas in a boiler or gas turbine.
Monitors dust emissions after wet scrubber cleaning or before reuse of converter gas in a boiler.

name: MARV Ex IR
shortDescription: All-in-one extractive dust, moisture, and gas composition monitoring system for dry and wet industrial processes.
longDescription: The MARV Ex IR is an all-in-one extractive, isokinetic, and temperature-controlled continuous monitoring system designed for precise measurement of dust concentration, moisture content, and gas composition in industrial stacks.
It is suitable for both dry and wet processes and ensures reliable operation under harsh process and ambient conditions.
The system features a heated sampling probe to vaporize moisture, an air or nitrogen-purged optical sensor module, and an integrated PLC, all housed in a weather-proof, powder-coated steel enclosure.
Measurement is performed using optical forward scattering for dust detection and infrared absorption for moisture and gas composition analysis, enabling accurate and continuous emissions monitoring.
features: Simultaneous measurement of dust, moisture, and gas composition
Heated sampling probe for continuous moisture vaporization
Optical forward scattering dust measurement
Infrared absorption measurement for moisture and gas composition
Air or N₂ purged optical sensor module
Extractive and isokinetic sampling design
Integrated PLC with remote communication interfaces
Weather-proof IP65 steel enclosure

applications.description: Continuous monitoring of dust concentration and gas composition in dry flue gas streams.
Simultaneous measurement of dust, moisture, and gas composition after scrubbers or in moisture-saturated gas streams.

name: MARV 2Ex IR
shortDescription: All-in-one extractive dust, moisture, and gas composition monitoring system for ATEX Zone 1/2 explosive atmospheres.
longDescription: The MARV 2Ex IR is an all-in-one extractive, isokinetic, and temperature-controlled continuous monitoring system designed for simultaneous measurement of dust concentration, moisture content, and gas composition in industrial stacks located in explosive atmospheres.

Certified for ATEX Zone 1/2 applications, the system uses a nitrogen-heated sampling probe, nitrogen-purged optical sensor module, and an integrated PLC housed in a weather-proof, powder-coated steel enclosure.
A protective nitrogen overpressure prevents the formation of explosive gas atmospheres inside the analyzer.

Measurement is based on optical forward scattering for dust detection and infrared absorption for moisture and gas composition analysis, ensuring reliable and accurate monitoring in dry and wet process conditions.

Simultaneous measurement of dust, moisture, and gas composition

Nitrogen-heated sampling probe for moisture vaporization
N₂-purged optical sensor module with protective gas overpressure

PLC visualization software with local HMI (optional) and Web HMI
Infrared and visible optical system covering 200 nm to 20,000 nm

applications.description: Measurement of dust, moisture, and CO/CO₂/CH₄ concentrations before reuse of blast furnace gas in gas turbines or boilers under explosive atmosphere conditions.
Continuous emission monitoring of dust, moisture, and CO/CO₂ concentrations in converter flue gas within ATEX-regulated environments.

name: MARV Analyzer
shortDescription: All-in-one analyzer for gas, dust, and moisture measurement in dry and wet industrial processes.
longDescription: The MARV Analyzer is a flow- and temperature-controlled system for continuous measurement of dust, moisture, and gas composition in industrial processes. It operates reliably in dry or wet conditions, including explosive atmospheres (ATEX Zone 1/2), making it ideal for steel production, emission control, and other harsh industrial environments.

At its core is a 3rd generation five-zone optical cell. The central zone holds undiluted sample gas, while surrounding purge zones protect optical windows from dust, moisture, and corrosive condensates. This design prevents fouling, maintains accurate measurements, and allows operation at up to 200 °C and 10 bar. Optical windows are made of durable infrared- and visible-transparent materials for chemical and thermal stability.

Dual-path optics enable simultaneous measurement of gas and dust. Infrared absorption analyzes gas and moisture, while visible-light forward scattering measures dust concentrations from 0.1 to 300 mg/m³. Sample gas is measured undiluted, with algorithmic compensation ensuring accurate multi-component analysis.

The modular design supports NDIR, TDLA, and FTIR spectroscopy, allowing flexible configuration and wide dynamic range measurement. The MARV Analyzer measures gases from ppm levels to high concentrations (e.g., CO up to 70% vol) while monitoring dust and moisture, providing a robust and precise solution for industrial process monitoring.
features: Simultaneous measurement of dust, moisture, and gas composition
Dual-path optical system: IR absorption + visible light scattering
Five-zone optical cell with purge protection against contamination
Accurate measurement in undiluted gas streams
Supports NDIR, TDLA, and FTIR spectroscopy methods
Modular IR sources and detectors for flexible configuration
Wide dynamic measurement range (ppm to high % concentrations)
Operates in explosive atmospheres (ATEX Zone 1/2)
Resistant to high temperature (up to 200 °C) and pressure (up to 10 bar)
No sample conditioning required for dust measurement
